title: Why can you not interupt yas ult?
body: So, as a support main,when i play champions with some sort of displacement, i feel that yas's ult has 0 couterplay if somone gets knocked up, i mean, i cant headbutt him out of it as ali, even if i do, my ally still stays in the air and takes the damage. shouldnt it be similar to ww ult, where you take the damaeg but the cc is removed? i meanit seems a litle stupid that if you are knocked away your abliity still goes. also, is his ult a dash or a blink, because the animation makes it look like a dash

replies.body:
I think it's actually the most balanced part of his kit XD

You can QSS his ult if it's really problematic. It's also one the few abilities in League that requires team-mates to execute properly (e.g. you basically need **Malphite** ult lategame).
You don't need teammates to use Yas' ulti...his Q provides a knockup when charged.

His q is also incredibly hard to pull off in a teamfight lategame since you need to charge it up and what are you going to use to charge it up? Enemies? They're going to retaliate and squash your squishy ass.

not really, you have a minion wave, you have a knockup. and really, you have a teamfight, at least one other person is gonna have a displacement. especially lower ranks where braum and thresh and orianna are pretty common.
Ali q cancels it his w doesnt, its rito logic

Because giving 1 champion everything they could want isn't enough... they have to make it so you cant stop them either.

But in all seriousness, yes you should be able to interrupt it, they took Fiora's old ult away because it was cancerous to have an ult like that that you couldn't stop. I don't see why Yasuo's should be an exception.

"Yasuo's is an exception" because you can burst his ass of before he even completes the animation, and any stuns you use during the animation will apply that full duration to him after he has finished, there are also some spells that stop his ult doing any thing as well, skarner r stops it, ali q (not w) stops it, ww ult stops it (all supresses stop him ulting, snares and stuns will apply after the animation), qss stops it, knockups over a second stop him,silences make him useless after ulting.
 
Unlike fiora his ult puts him in a weak spot for 1 sec where he cant react to shit all, so instead of you thick skulled idiots running because you're scared of it, you could easily kill him during its cast time. 

Or, Or

You could learn to play, yasuo's players are so fucking predictable its not funny, a non idiot would be able to easily read them.

I'm not saying I'm condoning yasou's ult being uninteruptable, I do agree it probably shouldn't be like this or at least you can interupt the windup for it; but it does leave him vulnerable after he's used it and if anyone isn't caught in it, they can cc him in place after he's done. Also finding the opportunity to ult in a teamfight can be really hard.

you can stop the wind up
It doesn't leave him vulnerable at all. Once his ulti finishes he can cast straight away.

Yas is never truly vulnerable. Aurelion Sol is a vulnerable champ. Yasuo isn't.

And the opportunity to ult is never that hard to find, usually a malphite or something will ult in and then you've got the whole enemy team in your sights. And if you're by yourself, just ult the squishies and don't ult the tanks_ (the same as every other champion in the game)_ and its pretty hard to go wrong.
Knockups are un-cleanse-able in general. Also if you headbutt warwick off your adc you'll notice your adc will still be surpressed unless they qss.
nah, it removes the suppress, but still does the damage.
I've played warwick alot and I always thought it was funny that I sometimes would get peeled off and hey the adc would still be locked in place and surpressed but I guess they must have changed that.
